titleStmt.title: The Latine grammar. Or, A guide teaching a compendious way to attaine exact skill in the Latine tongue for a proper congruity and elegant variety of phrases in prose and verse. Published for the common good in continuation of a former guide, teaching to read English rightly, and write accordingly. By Richard Lloyd.
Latine grammar.
titleStmt.author: Lloyd, Richard, 1594 or 5-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Thomas Roycroft, for the author,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
